member.name: ColorCurve.GetParameters
member.summary: The ColorCurve.GetParameters gets the current values of the parameters of this ColorCurve object.
member.param: Pointer to a UINT that specifies the size, in bytes, of a structure.
Pointer to a structure that receives the parameter values.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: ColorCurve.SetParameters
member.summary: The ColorCurve.SetParameters method sets the parameters of this ColorCurve object.
member.param: Pointer to a structure that specifies the parameters.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.
